text: Jean-Louis Dumont (born April 6, 1944 in Jonville-en-Woëvre) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Meuse department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:People from Meuse (department) Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Louis Dumont
